component.text: Use every possible decryption key until a result is found matching the corresponding plaintext.
Use every possible encryption key until a result is found matching the corresponding ciphertext.

With a Meet-in-the-Middle attack, the attacker has some portion of text in both plaintext and ciphertext. The attacker attempts to unencrypt the ciphertext with all possible keys while simultaneously encrypting the plaintext with another set of possible keys until one match is found.
